actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit a parent who supports a handicapped child to take a personal exemption for that child even though the child earns more than $750.

summary.text: Permits, under the Internal Revenue Code, a parent who supports a handicapped child to take a personal exemption for that child without consideration of such child's income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit a parent who supports a handicapped child to take a personal exemption for that child even though the child earns more than $750.
